column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////I've read all over about this restaurant and the consensus is that the side dishes are nothing short of perfection at Bavette's.  The reviews were all spot
column3: if you enjoy corn you must order this dish.  The corn was cooked perfectly
column4: and had such depth of flavor.  Not traditional flavors you might expect at a steakhouse or french restaurant but nothing about this restaurant is what you'd expect.  All good things.
